advancement.etheria.dungeons.title: Light in Ruins
advancement.etheria.ether_source.descrip: Use the Ether Source to fill any Ether vessel with ether.
advancement.etheria.ether_source.title: Glimpse of Power
advancement.etheria.magemicon.title: Beginning of Journey
advancement.etheria.rituals.title: Song of Magic
advancement.etheria.runes.title: Symbols of Ancients
advancement.etheria.scroll.title: Element in Blood
advancement.etheria.spell_scroll.title: Key to Power
etheria.emblem.switched: The emblem's element has been changed to: %1$s.
etheria.gacha.inventory: Your inventory does not have enough space.
etheria.gacha.start: To start, press again while holding [SHIFT].
etheria.gacha.warn: The altar is currently occupied by another player.
etheria.message.cryo: You have approached the Cryo Seers' dungeon.
etheria.message.ether: You have approached the Kor-Lunar tree.
etheria.message.ether_mirror_on_level: The Ether Mirror only works in the Overworld.
etheria.message.pyro: You have approached the Pyro Seers' dungeon.
etheria.new_element: Element available for change in Kor-Lunar
etheria.rituals.warn.lvl: Kor-Lunar level is insufficient. Required level
etheria.skill.combat.2: Increases maximum health by 1%s% heart units.
etheria.skill.combat.3: When taking damage, grants a 1%s%% chance to reduce incoming damage.
etheria.skill.combat.4: Increases attack speed by 1%s%% when holding a sword in the main hand.
etheria.skill.combat.5: Increases attack speed by 1%s%% when holding an axe in the main hand.
etheria.skill.combat.6: 30% chance to restore 1%s% heart units with each successful hit.
etheria.skill.combat.7: On a successful hit, grants a 1%s%% chance to temporarily increase movement speed.
etheria.skill.mining.11: Expands pickaxe capabilities, allowing mining blocks with a 3x3 radius.
etheria.skill.mining.15: Chance 1%s%% to gain the Haste effect for a short time.
etheria.skill.mining.16: Chance 1%s% to receive a random treasure chest item for every block mined with a shovel.
etheria.skill.mining.2: When using a pickaxe in the off-hand, has a 10% chance to speed up block mining.
etheria.skill.mining.20: Chance 1%s%% to gain the Haste effect for a short time when using an axe.
etheria.skill.mining.21: Chance 1%s% to double the wood harvested with an axe.
etheria.skill.mining.22: Chance 1%s% to receive charcoal when chopping wood with an axe.
etheria.skill.mining.3: Reduces tool durability consumption while mining by 15%.
etheria.skill.mining.5: Chance 1%s%% to obtain an additional gold nugget when mining gold ores.
etheria.skill.mining.6: Chance to gain 1%s% experience when mining ores.
etheria.skill.mining.7: Chance 1%s%% to restore 1 heart of health when mining ores.
etheria.skill.mining.8: Allows mining blocks with a 3x1 radius using a pickaxe.
etheria.skill.not_learned: This skill has not been learned yet.
etheria.skillbar.description: This bar shows how much experience is left until the next branch level and a new Skill Point.
etheria.skillbar.title: Experience
etheria.xp.combat: Defeating creatures grants experience based on their maximum health.
etheria.xp.fishing: Successful fishing grants experience. More experience is gained at night.
etheria.xp.magic: Using spells grants experience. Successfully hitting enemies grants additional experience.
etheria.xp.woodcutting: Cutting down trees grants a small amount of experience.
item.etheria.elemental_emblem.tooltip: Guides the way to the Seers' ruins and Kor-Lunar. [SHIFT] + [RIGHT CLICK] to switch.
item.etheria.enigma_orb.tooltip: An Ether Vessel that stores a large amount of Ether for spells and rituals.
item.etheria.ether_crystal.tooltip: A small vessel of Ether, which stores Ether for spells and rituals.
item.etheria.ether_orb.tooltip: A vessel of Ether, which stores Ether for spells and rituals.
item.etheria.fire_seal.tooltip: Can melt a massive block of ice in the Seers' dungeon.
item.etheria.flame_fragment.tooltip: Can melt a massive block of ice in the Seers' dungeon.
item.etheria.frost_heart.tooltip: Can extinguish a bright invisible flame in the Seers' dungeon.
item.etheria.ice_crystal.tooltip: Can extinguish a bright invisible flame in the Seers' dungeon.
item.etheria.magic_stick.tooltip: Uses Ether to cast spells. Hold %1$s to open the list of spells.
mage_micon.constellation.active_spells.d: Assign up to 5 learned spells to slots for use. A spell won’t work if its element is not active.
mage_micon.constellation.basics_path.des: The starting constellation. Follow this path to learn the basic mechanics of the mod and unlock access to others.
mage_micon.constellation.elements.descri: Choose your first element for free. Others can be unlocked by obtaining Elemental Scrolls. You can have up to two active elements.
mage_micon.constellation.rituals.descrip: Contains information about rituals. Unlock stars to reveal recipes for creating items.
mage_micon.constellation.skills.descript: Distribute Skill Points to improve your abilities. Active skills can be toggled on and off.
mage_micon.constellation.spells.descript: This is where all spells are unlocked and studied. View stats and requirements for each of them.
mage_micon.hint.artifacts.description: Deep within the Elemental Dungeons, you can find items infused with elemental power and the will of their long-forgotten creators.
mage_micon.hint.elemental_compass.descri: The stars on the map are nodes of energy. Move them so that the flow line connects them all, touching every gray star on its path.
mage_micon.hint.elemental_search.descrip: The stars on the map are nodes of energy. Move them so that the flow line connects them all, touching every gray star on its path.
mage_micon.hint.ether.description: Veins of a purple, glowing mineral are appearing all over the world. Perhaps, its depths hold the first key to the power of Ether.
mage_micon.hint.ether_source.description: Using the ingot as a base, create a perfect crystalline vessel. Its recipe can be found in the lore of Ether Vessels.
mage_micon.hint.ether_vessels.descriptio: Concentrate the power of ether into an ingot to advance further on the path of knowledge.
mage_micon.hint.icy_storm.description: Elemental dungeons hold within their depths not only trials, but also treasures with forgotten knowledge.
mage_micon.hint.phoenix_rise.description: Elemental dungeons hold within their depths not only trials, but also treasures with forgotten knowledge.
mage_micon.hint.ritual_fundamentals.desc: Performing rituals requires special structures. The recipe for one such structure can be found in the lore of the Ether Source.
mage_micon.hint.spells_fundamentals.desc: The stars on the map are nodes of energy. Move them so that the flow line connects them all, touching every gray star on its path.
mage_micon.kor_lunar_up: Your Kor-Lunar level has increased to 1%$% level!
mage_micon.new_element: Element available for change in Kor-Lunar
mage_micon.page.anvil_artifacts: Place an artifact and a reinforcement material in the corresponding slots. The Ether Anvil will weave new power into the artifact, creating its exalted version.
mage_micon.page.anvil_spells: Choose a spell and an artifact. The Ether Anvil will fuse their powers, crafting an exalted version of the spell. The artifact will be consumed in the process.
mage_micon.page.anvil_weapon: Choose a weapon and an artifact. The Ether Anvil will imbue the weapon with the artifact’s magical power, exalting it. The artifact will vanish in the process.
mage_micon.page.kor_lunar_artifacts: §lInfusion of Power §r— an ancient practice of the Seers, allowing Kor-Lunar to be nourished with discovered artifacts. By placing artifacts into the tree's slots, you transfer their power to yourself. The artifacts’ attributes become part of your essence, and the tree reveals your true potential more deeply.
mage_micon.page.kor_lunar_elements: §lElemental Interweaving §r— a gift left by the Seers for those who have mastered the power of Ether. Upon studying the scroll, you become a part of the chosen element, but true harmony is only achieved at the Kor-Lunar tree. Here, you can access another element you have previously mastered, changing your bond with the tree.
mage_micon.page.kor_lunar_upgrade: §lKor-Lunar§r is a tree of magical power deeply connected to ether. The deeper your bond with Kor-Lunar, the more paths open to mastering artifacts and spells.
mage_micon.page.reroll_artifacts: §lArtifact Reroll§r allows you to transform the attributes of an artifact. Main attributes may change if the artifact§o has not been exalted§r. If exaltation has already occurred, only secondary properties will be affected. This process requires essence.
mage_micon.page.spell_upgrade: §lSpell Exaltation§r allows you to enhance their attributes. Additional attributes gained from the fusion of a spell and an artifact will not be improved. This process requires essence.
mage_micon.rituals.awakening_of_ether.de: The ritual is used to increase the level of Kor-Lunar.
mage_micon.rituals.fusion_of_elements.de: The ritual is used to increase the level of Kor-Lunar.
mage_micon.rituals.kor_lunar_seal.descri: The ritual is used to increase the level of Kor-Lunar.
mage_micon.rituals.world_merging.descrip: The ritual is used to increase the level of Kor-Lunar.
mage_micon.spell.blazing_ring.descriptio: Creates a zone infused with fiery warmth, gradually healing allies within its reach.
mage_micon.spell.fire_rain.description: Calls forth a searing rain of fiery shards, scorching the ground and enemies beneath.
mage_micon.spell.fire_whirl.description: Summons a fiery whirlwind that swirls around the caster, scorching nearby enemies on contact.
mage_micon.spell.fireball.description: Creates a blazing fireball that flies toward the caster's gaze, erupting in flames upon impact.
mage_micon.spell.flame_explosion.descrip: A fiery explosion that scorches everything around, dealing damage and knocking back those caught in its fury.
mage_micon.spell.frost_explosion.descrip: A destructive burst of frost and ice, unleashing cold upon all nearby and knocking enemies away.
mage_micon.spell.frost_shackles.descript: Freezes the ground beneath the enemy, binding them with icy chains and halting their movement.
mage_micon.spell.frozen_orbit.descriptio: Creates a rotating orbit of icy shards that damage enemies on contact.
mage_micon.spell.icy_barrage.description: Unleashes a volley of ice shards that seek out and strike the nearest target.
mage_micon.spell.icy_spear.description: Summons an ice shard infused with eternal cold, delivering precise and devastating damage upon impact.
mage_micon.spell.icy_storm.description: Unleashes a fierce winter vortex, lifting enemies into the air and bombarding them with a hail of icy arrows.
mage_micon.spell.icy_sword.description: Manifests a blade of pure ice, slashing at nearby foes.
mage_micon.spell.phoenix_rise.descriptio: Invokes the power of the Phoenix, lifting the caster skyward and raining fiery projectiles upon nearby enemies.
mage_micon.warn.ritual_crash:
This ritual has a %1$s%%
chance of failing.
